\# Flower Classifier 



This Project is a Flower Classifier using artificial intelligence.

It is implemented in a Jupyter Notebook and trains a simple model to distinguish between different species of flowers.



\## INSTALATION



1. Clone Repository



```Bash



git clone https://github.com/NvirAdan/Flower-Classifier-AI.git

cd "Flower Classifier IA"







2\. Install Dependencies



```Bash



pip install -r requirements.txt







3\. Execute Jupyter Notebook





jupyter notebook notebook.ipynb





Tech:



-Scikit-learn

-Python

-Matplotlib

-Jupyter Notebook
